api_list.name: Get Recipe Schema by Recipe ID
api_list.description: Get Recipe Schema by Recipe ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipe-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipe-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Recipe API Home
